column4: BRIEF-Microsoft Adds 315 Megawatts Of New Solar Power In Virginia
column5: * MICROSOFT ADDS 315 MEGAWATTS OF NEW SOLAR POWER IN VIRGINIA IN LARGEST CORPORATE SOLAR AGREEMENT IN THE UNITED STATES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

column4: World's top wealth fund says opposed Musk's $2.6 billion pay deal
column5: OSLO The world's largest sovereign wealth fund opposed Elon Musk's potential $2.6 billion payout from electric carmaker Tesla   the fund said on Thursday.

column4: Tesla shareholders approve CEO Musk's $2.6 billion compensation plan
column5: SAN FRANCISCO/BOSTON Shareholders of electric car company Tesla Inc approved a compensation package potentially worth $2.6 billion for Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk on Wednesday  though by a lower margin than U.S. CEOs typically receive on pay votes.

column4: UPDATE 1-World's top wealth fund says opposed Musk's $2.6 bln pay deal
column5: OSLO  March 22 The world's largest sovereign wealth fund opposed Elon Musk's potential $2.6 billion payout from electric carmaker Tesla  the fund said on Thursday.

column4: Norway's wealth fund opposed Tesla chief's stock option plan
column5: OSLO  March 22 Norway's $1 trillion sovereign wealth fund  the world's largest  opposed Tesla Inc Chief Executive Elon Musk's compensation package in Wednesday's shareholder vote  the fund said on its website.
